data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Bollaert-Delelis have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Jeremy Stinat, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Montpellier.
Lens have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lens.
In the minute 4, Jeremy Stinat signals a Lens throw-in in Montpellier's half.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Lens in the half of Montpellier.
Lens's Gael Kakuta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jeremy Stinat awards Montpellier a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Lens pushes forward through Florian Sotoca, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Montpellier's Stephy Mavididi scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Andy Delort.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 18, Lens to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Throw-in Lens.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 21, Lens have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Montpellier.
In the minute 26, Goal! Pedro Mendes extends Montpellier's lead to 0-2.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Montpellier.
Can Lens capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montpellier's half?
In the minute 30, Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Montpellier throw-in in Lens's half.
Andy Delort (Montpellier) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 31, Lens have a goal kick.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Throw-in for Montpellier in the half of Lens.
In the minute 35, Montpellier attack but Gaetan Laborde's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lens.
Jeremy Stinat signals a throw-in for Lens, close to Montpellier's area.
In the minute 36, Jonas Omlin keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
Throw-in Montpellier.
Free kick Lens.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
In the minute 38, Pedro Mendes (Montpellier) gets a yellow card.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in high up the field for Lens in Lens.
Lens surge into the attack at Stade Bollaert-Delelis but Arnaud Kalimuendoâ€™s header is off-target.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lens.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 45, Lens are coming forward and Loic Bade gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Jonathan Clauss for Lens drives towards goal at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Jeremy Stinat has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Jeremy Stinat awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Lens.
In the minute 49, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Seko Fofana for Lens who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jonas Omlin is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Lensâ€™s Seko Fofana is on his feet again at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 50, Jonas Omlin for Montpellier is back on the field again.
Gael Kakuta levels the score at 2-2 from the penalty spot.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 52, Jeremy Stinat awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Throw-in for Montpellier close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lens.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 57, Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
In the minute 59, Lens to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Montpellier.
In the minute 63, In Lens, Andy Delort of Montpellier is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Gaetan Laborde (Montpellier) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
In the minute 65, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Montpellier.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 68, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Goal! A Gaetan Laborde header gives Montpellier a 2-3 lead in Lens.
In the minute 69, Florent Mollet with an assist there.
The home team have replaced Arnaud Kalimuendo with Ignatius Kpene Ganago. This is the first substitution made today by Franck Haise.
Jeremy Stinat awards Lens a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Lens.
In the minute 72, Montpellier drives forward and Stephy Mavididi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Lens.
Yannick Cahuzac is booked for the home team.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Franck Haise (Lens) is making a second substitution, with Clement Michelin replacing Issiaga Sylla.
Ismael Boura is replacing Jonathan Clauss for the home team.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, Important block from the Montpellier defence as Clement Michelin fires in a strike for Lens.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Lens throw-in in Montpellier's half.
Lens's Gael Kakuta breaks free at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 80, Montpellier have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Montpellier make their first substitution with Yun Il-Lok replacing Stephy Mavididi.
The away team replace Teji Savanier with Keagan Dolly.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Montpellier.
In the minute 83, Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
Franck Haise is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade Bollaert-Delelis with Simon Banza replacing Steven Fortes.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Lens.
Ignatius Kpene Ganago gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lens.
Lens needs to be cautious. Montpellier have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vitorino Hilton is on a sub for Florent Mollet for Montpellier.
Lens to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Corner awarded to Lens.
Lens advance rapidly upfield but Jeremy Stinat blows for offside.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Lens.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Full-time! The final score is 2-3.
